participant_1.background:
I enjoy water skiing but feel like I need to find another creative outlet to express myself.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.
I sometimes get too caught up in my own head and don't listen to my partner.
i like to make short films.
I have a mobile that plays music in my daughter's nursery.

participant_2.background:
My days consist of juggling graduate school, my pregnancy, and my anxiety disorder
i love shoes.
I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
my mother was a school music teacher.
My relationships are the most valuable thing I own because they are a source of joy and support.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I am doing well too! I am a single parent to my 2 year old daughter, and I rescue animals in my spare time.
That sounds like a very busy life! I am happy that you are doing well, though.
Thank you! I am also a filmmaker and make short films.
That is so cool! I love watching short films.
Thank you! I am looking for another creative outlet to express myself. Do you have any hobbies?
I love shoes and have a lot of them. I also love to cuddle up with my dog on rainy days.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I love cuddling with my daughter on a rainy day too.
It is the best! I also enjoy my relationship with my family and friends. They are the most important thing to me.
I agree! My relationships are also the most important thing to me.
That is great to hear! It sounds like you have a lot going for you.
Thank you! I think so too
